topic.title: New site for media download
topic.body:
In an effort to make it easier to get media to everyone, we've started a new site called Cat UtPult - 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1t8TNKTUfJWrrxR7xqUKGjdt1K9EsqUtP

Find movies, TV, music, books etc... that you want in the DMD Catalogs, send in your request and we will post a download link on Cat UtPult that you can paste into your browser.
We are using WebTorrent because it makes it very easy for anyone to download since everything happens in the browser. Equally important, WebTorrent it is P2P based like ZeroNet so files go directly from our servers to you. It is also a true BitTorrent based system so the more seeds there are the faster downloads happen. You can seed a downloaded file just by leaving the download page (Instant Io) open in your browser.

This is an experiment and we have a limited amount of server bandwidth to throw at this so let us know if you have problems or questions (post on DMDTalk at http://127.0.0.1:43110/1LBUGxoE9kvLUNshAeTWWZUiofaHpT1nhR).

Thanks!
DMD

topic.title: Cat UtPult site details
topic.body:
At the moment, file size for download should be under 2 gigabytes. Otherwise you could be waiting over an hour for a download. This assumes the worst case of only 2 seeders. Speed goes up dramatically with just a few more seeders.

Ignore all the errors you see on the Instant Io download page. They are mostly for the developers and usually don't affect the download.

We have two servers for seeding so you should see 2 peers on the download page. A lot of the time the second server/peer doesn't get added until about 20% of the file is down.

topic.title: Movies and TV on Cat UtPult
topic.body:
To get things started have put up about 50 movies and TV shows on Cat UtPult
The Movies are all SD quality to get them under 1 gigabyte for a reasonable download time.
The TV shows are all the first episodes of a smattering of popular shows

topic.title: NoScript on WebTorrent (Cat UtPult) will not allow downloading
topic.body:
IMPORTANT -
If you are using a plugin like NoScript with your browser it will prevent the download from beginning.
Even if you give WebTorrent (Instant Io page) temporary permissions with NoScript it still will not start.
If you have NoScript installed you must disable it and restart your browser - then WebTorrent will work.

In other words, like ZeroNet, Javascript must be enabled in order for WebTorrent to work.

You should see "Log" and "Downloading torrent from (address)" come on the screen and then 30-60 seconds later the download should begin.

1567311563_1DtDb2LXvnxGVkpuNv9CEeBnpcB6s.body:
Double checked the original uploads and they all have the text file links - not sure why yours is missing, sorry about that.
Yes, your right, posting in bulk would be better, but the owner of ZeroUp has put limitations on it.
All files must be 10mb minimum and 200mb maximum, with only a few file types such as .zip accepted.
It also looks like the maximum you can have up at any one time is 1 gigabyte.

We may switch to another site or clone one eventyally, but for now ZeroUp is simple and easy to use.
thanks for your comment,

By the way,
the uploads we do on ZeroUp are really just to try and duplicate a free upload service we have called File Cannon.
We have millions of files available through the DMD catalogs.

Our ZeroNet zite - (only movie catalogs can fit due to size limitations)
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BVQqm21fV2K3yw5iaXvoZk23mho1vaqHv

Our clearnet site -
https://dmd.delivery

Look under "Catalog and DMD Statistics" for more information on what we have available.

1567484746_1DtDb2LXvnxGVkpuNv9CEeBnpcB6s.body:
If you mean on ZeroNet, yes, we would love to, but ZeroUp has a 1 gig ceiling.
You probably know more about the other zites on ZeroNet than we do, save us some time and suggest a good site we can upload to and we will leave all of our stuff up.
The media we are posting here is the most recent stuff, but of course you can request anything that is a little older from the massive catalogs we have with DMD.
Our File Cannon service will email you any file we have that is 25mb or less for free, all you have to do is ask.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BVQqm21fV2K3yw5iaXvoZk23mho1vaqHv
www.dmd.delivery
thanks,

Sorry, yes we did look at 08chan and Millchan using the links you provided.
The only issue with those being because of their size there is a lot of updating and loading going on, slowing things down. This may be more of a problem from our side due to running everything through Tor, not sure.
ZeroUp is convenient because it is small and light.
That being said, we will most likely take your advice and upload to those sites in order to keep files available to everyone.
thanks,

1568491418_1CTghuxuyrvoERqDiBxnFhJHUtn6i.body:
Right now we are only uploading files that are 2 gigabytes or smaller on Cat UtPult because we have a limited number of servers/peers. That file is 3.4 gig so with only a couple of peers it would take a really long time to download.
You can always pay a little to have it sent to you on flash drive - 
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1BVQqm21fV2K3yw5iaXvoZk23mho1vaqHv
www.dmd.delivery

thanks!
